类的使用
org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.CompositeReactiveHealthIndicator

  • 使用CompositeReactiveHealthIndicator的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.boot.actuate.health
    Actuator health indicator and endpoints.

    • org.springframework.boot.actuate.health中CompositeReactiveHealthIndicator的使用

      返回CompositeReactiveHealthIndicator的org.springframework.boot.actuate.health中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      CompositeReactiveHealthIndicator CompositeReactiveHealthIndicator.addHealthIndicator(String name, ReactiveHealthIndicator indicator)
      Add a ReactiveHealthIndicator with the specified name.
      CompositeReactiveHealthIndicator CompositeReactiveHealthIndicatorFactory.createReactiveHealthIndicator(HealthAggregator healthAggregator, Map<String,ReactiveHealthIndicator> reactiveHealthIndicators, Map<String,HealthIndicator> healthIndicators)
      Create a CompositeReactiveHealthIndicator based on the specified health indicators.
      CompositeReactiveHealthIndicator CompositeReactiveHealthIndicator.timeoutStrategy(long timeout, Health timeoutHealth)
      Specify an alternative timeout Health if a HealthIndicator failed to reply after specified timeout.
